page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION,AGNES
page.content: St Agnes is one of the smallest island in Scilly. It is in the Atlantic ocean. There is only one shop on Agnes and that sells toys as well as food and everything. We get our food from the mainland because the Scillonian and the helicopter comes from Penzance and brings our goods up and then the Gugh boat brings our food and mail over to St Agnes from St Marys. There is a school on St Agnes with only seven children. You start when you are five and go to the secondary school on St Marys when you are eleven. You board at hostel from Monday to Friday. StAgnes has beaches, open grassy spaces and farmland. It has only a tiny lane with very little traffic. Most people own a boat.
